entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 16 except minus 25 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 early this evening then becoming northwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 16 except minus 25 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 14 except minus 20 in low lying areas.
